general_requirements.statewide_program_name: Building and electrical permits required. Seattle offers same-day online issuance for systems under 7.7 kW without plan review. PE stamps required for commercial installations.

interconnection.net_metering_details: Net metering available for systems up to 100 kW. Puget Sound Energy, Seattle City Light primary utilities.
interconnection.fees: PSE: minimal interconnection fee; Seattle City Light: $0

special_considerations.hoa_restrictions: RCW 64.38.055 limits HOA restrictions on solar installations.
special_considerations.historic_districts: Seattle historic districts require additional review.
special_considerations.wind_load_requirements: Standard IBC wind loads. Design wind speeds 85-100 mph.
special_considerations.snow_load_requirements: Cascade areas significant snow loads 50-200+ psf.

licensing.license_type: Washington State L&I electrical contractor license required.

notes: Seattle same-day permits for <7.7 kW systems. Larger systems require plan review with fees based on system size. Strong net metering policy.
